video.title: Melissa & Joey
video.synopsis: Single politician Mel hires unemployed stockbroker Joe as a live-in "manny" (male nanny) when she is made guardian of her niece and nephew.

episodes.synopsis: Mel, must hire a "manny" when her niece and nephew are sent to live with her.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Joe deals with getting his stuff back from his ex-wife, most importantly his flat screen TV.  Mel dates a guy with ulterior motives.  Lennox tries to make friends in her new school.
episodes.title: Moving On

episodes.synopsis: Joe finds it difficult to meet women while working as a nanny.  Mel helps Joe lie to score a date.
episodes.title: Nanny Love

episodes.synopsis: Lennox starts dating a bad boy that Mel disapproves of, while Mel is also dating a bad boy of her own.
episodes.title: Boy Toys R Us

episodes.synopsis: Mel's father's visit causes lots of tension in the house.
episodes.title: The Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: Mel starts to spy on Joe when she becomes suspicious of his intentions. Meanwhile, they both suspect Ryder is victim to a bully.
episodes.title: Spies & Lies

episodes.synopsis: Joe dates a TV reporter working on a human interest story about Mel's life.
episodes.title: Up Close & Personal

episodes.synopsis: Mel agrees to dance with a dancer from "Dancing with the Stars" at a charity event in Toledo, but needs to learn how to dance first.
episodes.title: Dancing with the Stars of Toledo

episodes.synopsis: Joe was born at an Army base overseas and lost his birth certificate proving that he is a US citizen, and Mel has to protect him from getting in trouble with the law.
episodes.title: Seoul Man

episodes.synopsis: Mel brings Lennox to a convention where she meets the mayor's son, Brett. Brett dates Lennox, but winds up being more than Lennox bargained for.
episodes.title: In Lennox We Trust

episodes.synopsis: After hearing spooky noises coming from the attic, Mel discovers her brother-in-law, Lewis Scanlon, has been hiding there. Mel tries to convince Lewis to turn himself in while the neighborhood celebrates Halloween.
episodes.title: A Fright in the Attic

episodes.synopsis: Joe starts his own business and gets Mel to be an investor.
episodes.title: Joe Knows

episodes.synopsis: Joe's ex, Tiffany, tries to rekindle their relationship, but might be hiding a secret. Meanwhile, Lennox works on her popularity in school.
episodes.title: Enemies with Benefits

episodes.synopsis: Joe takes an interest in Mel's personal trainer; Lennox tries to be friends with Beckett.
episodes.title: Don't Train on My Parade

episodes.synopsis: A dinner between Mel, a Japanese businessman, and Joe, who acts as a translator, turns awkward; Lennox and her nemesis are forced to work on a project together.
episodes.title: Lost in Translation

episodes.synopsis: Mel surprises Joe at his college reunion, pretending to be his girlfriend, after discovering he's embarrassed about his life.
episodes.title: Joe Versus the Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Lennox is approached in a mall to be a model but has to persuade Mel for permission, while Joe helps Ryder ask a girl out.
episodes.title: Toledo's Next Top Model

episodes.synopsis: Mel plans a wedding at her home; Lennox and Ryder work on a documentary together.
episodes.title: The Mel Word

episodes.synopsis: Mel volunteers Joe for a school charity auction but the winner of the auction may have ulterior motives.
episodes.title: Auction Hero

episodes.synopsis: Mel feels the pressure to find someone when her last single friend gets engaged.
episodes.title: Waiting for Mr. Right

episodes.synopsis: Mel starts a romance with a younger man; Lennox challenges a classmate to be the editor of the school blog.
episodes.title: Young Love

episodes.synopsis: George throws a party for Mel to meet his friends; Joe confronts his ex-wife for going on a date at their spot on their anniversary.
episodes.title: Mel and Joe's Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: Mel contemplates her relationship with George; Ryder meets Holly's parents.
episodes.title: Going the Distance?

episodes.synopsis: Mel's father returns to lobby for a bill Mel is against; Lennox's poems garner the attention of a popular classmate who wants to be a singer.
episodes.title: All Politics Is Local

episodes.synopsis: Joe's younger half-brother visits and takes an interest in Mel.
episodes.title: The Other Longo

episodes.synopsis: Joe gets Ryder in trouble with his teacher; Mel sneaks Lennox into an 18-and-over concert.
episodes.title: Teacher/Teacher

episodes.synopsis: Mel recruits Joe to play on her office softball team; Ryder asks Lennox to post Holly's story on the school blog.
episodes.title: Play Ball

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe get into a property dispute with their neighbor; Ryder films a PSA starring Lennox.
episodes.title: A House Divided

episodes.synopsis: Mel convinces Joe to follow Lennox to her school dance; Holly gets jealous of Ryder.
episodes.title: Do As I Say, Not As I Did

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe are faced with difficult decisions after Joe comes into some money.
episodes.title: The Settlement

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe are at odds with a contractor for their home renovation; Lennox writes and performs in a controversial school play.
episodes.title: I Can Manage

episodes.synopsis: Tension grows between Mel and Joe as they continue to work on the home remodel; Lennox reluctantly works on the student spirit committee.
episodes.title: If You Can't Stand the Heat

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe discover Lennox spent the night in bed with her classmate; Ryder learns to shave with help from Holly.
episodes.title: Good to Go

episodes.synopsis: Joe suspects Mel is having an affair with a married man and tries to catch her in the act.
episodes.title: All Up in My Business

episodes.synopsis: When a video of Mel punching a guy in Ryder's defense is posted online, Mel spins the story to help with her campaign.
episodes.title: The Knockout

episodes.synopsis: Mel asks Joe to give some advice to Donald to help him get a job so she can break up with him.
episodes.title: Breaking Up Is Hard to Do

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe set each other up on blind dates.
episodes.title: Mixed Doubles

episodes.synopsis: Mel's friend wants to have a baby with Joe.
episodes.title: The Donor

episodes.synopsis: Mel's date thinks Joe's cooking is something Mel made; Lennox's friend has a crush on Ryder.
episodes.title: Eat, Pray, Date

episodes.synopsis: After Lennox breaks up with her new boyfriend, Mel starts dating his father behind her back. Joe tries to teach Ryder a lesson about the stock market.
episodes.title: Pretty Big Liars

episodes.synopsis: Joe gives driving lessons to Lennox without Mel's consent, but after Lennox gets into a minor accident, Joe tries to cover it up.
episodes.title: A Pair of Sneakers

episodes.synopsis: Mel's mother comes to visit and Lennox's gym teacher thinks Lennox is pregnant.
episodes.title: Mother of All Problems

episodes.synopsis: Lennox begins working in Mel's office but sparks fly when she meets the intern for her political rival; Joe works as a financial consultant.
episodes.title: Wherefore Art Lennox

episodes.synopsis: Joe's international financial consultant from Russia, Elena, shows up at the house unannounced.
episodes.title: From Russia With Love

episodes.synopsis: Joe proposes to Elena in order to save her from being sent back to Russia and Mel decides to officiate.
episodes.title: Mel Marries Joe

episodes.synopsis: Joe no longer feels needed as a nanny now that Lennox and Ryder are old enough to care for themselves, but Mel doesn't want to let him go.
episodes.title: Works for Me

episodes.synopsis: Mel dates a guy whose ex-wife happens to be dating Joe. Lennox is tempted to get a tattoo. Ryder misses being in school.
episodes.title: Toxic Parents

episodes.synopsis: Joe gets a new job that quickly lands him in the middle of a political scandal that could also jeopardize Mel's career.
episodes.title: Inside Job

episodes.synopsis: At the outset of an exciting new relationship for Joe, Mel makes him consider the virtues of waiting to have sex.
episodes.title: Can't Hardly Wait

episodes.synopsis: Mel reconnects with a childhood friend who Joe suspects could be her relative. Lennox faces a moral dilemma.
episodes.title: Oh, Brother

episodes.synopsis: Joe foils Mel and Austin's weekend plans. Leland, a homeschooled student, studies with Ryder, but things turn sour.
episodes.title: The Truth Hurts

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Austin have different opinions on the possibility of being parents. Lennox struggles to write her college admissions essay.
episodes.title: The Unkindest Cut

episodes.synopsis: Mel severs ties with a high-maintenance friend. Soon after, Joe begins to date her.
episodes.title: The Unfriending

episodes.synopsis: Mel scrambles to reestablish her relationship with Lennox after realizing she's behind the curve when it comes to Lennox's love life.
episodes.title: Something Happened

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe co-host a local news show.
episodes.title: Family Feud

episodes.synopsis: After a failed relationship, Mel tries to fast-track her new suitor by inviting him to crash at her place. Lennox struggles with her new internship.
episodes.title: Fast Times

episodes.synopsis: Mel is anxious to track down a personal video after Joe and Ryder accidentally sell her belongings at a garage sale.
episodes.title: Bad Influence

episodes.synopsis: Joe's tutoring business lands him in hot water. Mel goes behind Lennox's back and signs her up for college.
episodes.title: Teach Your Children

episodes.synopsis: Joe hatches a plan to disguise Mel as his ex-wife Tiffany to fulfill his beloved Nona's wishes at her 99th birthday party.
episodes.title: What Happens in Jersey...Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe find themselves in a compromising situation.
episodes.title: What Happens in Jersey...Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: After Joe's flight is cancelled, he ends up spending Christmas with Ryder and Lennox's mother Meredith, who destroyed his career.
episodes.title: A New Kind of Family Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Joe plans to confess his true feelings to Mel but finds her old boyfriend already there when he arrives. Rather than face heartbreak, he quits.
episodes.title: A Decent Proposal

episodes.synopsis: Joe moves out so he can properly "court" Mel, but finds his new place outrageously unaffordable...especially when she gets him fired!
episodes.title: Independence Day

episodes.synopsis: Joe's new job is occupying too much of his time so a lonely Mel drops by to say hello, a surprise that almost gets him fired.
episodes.title: The New Deal

episodes.synopsis: When Mel urges Joe to teaching her exercise class, she doesn't expect him to kick her out of it. Meanwhile, Lennox and Zender sell their web series.
episodes.title: Feel the Burn

episodes.synopsis: Mel invites Joe along to a work-related dinner, where he draws the wrong kind of attention for Mel when he shares his opinions (and a few of hers).
episodes.title: Plus One

episodes.synopsis: Joe doesn't want Mel to get a dog because he'll end up having to care for it. When Mel adopts one anyway, it ends up bonding with Joe instead of her.
episodes.title: House Broken

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joe decide to get couples counseling, and get a shock when the therapist turns out to be one of Joe's ex-girlfriends.
episodes.title: Couples Therapy

episodes.synopsis: Mel blurts out a secret and threatens a friendship and Zander hides out in Ryder's basement when he's kicked out of art school for failing grades.
episodes.title: To Tell the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Lennox moves out when Mel finds out about her relationship with Emerson and -- on Joe's advice -- forces her to end it.
episodes.title: My Roof, My Rules

episodes.synopsis: When they're asked to chaperone a dance at Ryder's school, Mel and Joe's own childish behavior gets them escorted from the building.
episodes.title: The Chaperones

episodes.synopsis: Mel's caught in the middle when her hairdresser hits Joe's car, and Ryder pulls out all the stops to win Stella back...in her chemistry class.
episodes.title: I'll Cut You

episodes.synopsis: Joe's pal Charlie asks him to be his wingman on a night out, but Mel doesn't like the idea. Lennox, meanwhile, is jealous of Zander's new roommates.
episodes.title: Catch & Release

episodes.synopsis: Mel's father arrives to help in the lead-up to the state senate election, but may ruin her chances when he accidentally texts a racy pic to her staff.
episodes.title: Born to Run

episodes.synopsis: Joe and Mel clash over a chair left to him by his late grandmother and Ryder makes a love connection with one of Zander's roommates.
episodes.title: More Than Roommates

episodes.synopsis: A home pregnancy test has Mel thinking she's expecting, but things get complicated when Joe finds the test and Lennox says it's hers.
episodes.title: Accidents Will Happen

episodes.synopsis: It's Mel and Joe's big day. But first they need to survive the bachelor parties, love triangles and unexpected confessions.
episodes.title: Right Time, Right Place

episodes.synopsis: Joe's mother and estranged brother drop by unexpectedly.
episodes.title: Uninvited

episodes.synopsis: A bachelor party injury, a last-minute dress replacement, a missing father, and a confession make Melissa and Joey's big day even more memorable.
episodes.title: You're the One That I Want

episodes.synopsis: Mel drops a bomb on Joe during the wedding.
episodes.title: Maybe I'm Amazed

episodes.synopsis: Joe neglects to inform Mel that he has asked his family to move in. Marco and Zander both try to win over Lennox. Ryder earns an odd credential from an online course.
episodes.title: At Last

episodes.synopsis: Mel's doctor stops by on Halloween and tries to convince a skeptical Mel and Joey that Mel used to be a teenage witch.
episodes.title: Witch Came First

episodes.synopsis: As Mel and Joey celebrate their first Christmas as a married couple, a squabble over an ornament leads to a tale about Mel's adventurous ancestor.
episodes.title: A Melanie and Josiah Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Mel's broken leg thwarts her hopes for a dream honeymoon, but Joey's attempts to surprise her with a cabin getaway only cause more chaos.
episodes.title: The Honeymooners

episodes.synopsis: Dani tries to do an end run around Joey when he tells her that she's too young to go on a date, which forces Mel into an uncomfortable position.
episodes.title: The Day After

episodes.synopsis: Joe wants to start a family right away, but Mel isn't sure she's ready yet. Meanwhile, Ryder has some surprising news for the family about his future.
episodes.title: Let's Get It Started

episodes.synopsis: The family is looking forward to video chatting with Ryder in Louisiana for his 18th birthday, but none of their computers are cooperating.
episodes.title: Failure to Communicate

episodes.synopsis: After finally finishing their thank-you notes for their wedding gifts, Mel and Joey are in trouble because of a cumbersome gift they returned.
episodes.title: Thanks, But No Thanks

episodes.synopsis: Mel uncovers a secret about Joey's past that has an impact on Dani's dreams of developing her musical talent and becoming a professional musician.
episodes.title: Face the Music

episodes.synopsis: Joe's plan to bring the family together by banning cell phones and computers for a weekend backfires when he needs his phone to accept a job offer.
episodes.title: Being There

episodes.synopsis: While Joe wrestles with the revelation that Danni has been caught drinking wine, Mel copes with Lennox's crush on her college professor.
episodes.title: Parental Guidance

episodes.synopsis: Felicia threatens to take custody of Dani away from Joe, while Mel struggles to prevent Lennox from following her professor to Colombia.
episodes.title: Gone Girl

episodes.synopsis: Mel and Joey are eager to expand the family, but things aren't going so smoothly for Ryder, who quits AmeriCorps after being dumped by his girlfriend.
episodes.title: You Say You Want an Ovulation
